title: Black Lagoon Omake
synopsis: Special omake episodes from the Blu-Ray releases, showing the heroines and foes in funny, uncommon situations.
voices: ['Toyoguchi, Megumi', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Tomizawa, Michie', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Minami, Omi', 'Kuwashima, Houko', 'Isobe, Tsutomu', 'Karasawa, Jun']
